About

The Song of Urania is a podcast about the history of astronomy from antiquity to the present. New episodes are released every full moon. The goal of the podcast is to deeply understand the development of astronomy, the oldest of the sciences. The podcast examines not only the ideas that succeeded, but also those that failed.
